Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory612.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory782.jpg'}
{3: 'The formidable enemy is vanquished, and the world-engulfing Red Tide retreats completely.'}
{3: 'The once-red sky clears to reveal a brilliant blue dome, bathed in radiant light.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With Jetavie by your side, patches of light dancing between your figures, even the air feels fresher.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Thanks to you, Chosen One, the system's firewall begins to rebuild itself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "This time, we're on the brink of a brighter future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "The possibilities you've defended have surmounted countless obstacles to reach this point.", 4: '1'}
{2: "But you're the guardian of these possibilities.", 3: '17'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "I've forgotten so much, and even tapping into the residual memory traces can't jog my recollection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Chosen One, call me stubborn, but I just can't bear the thought of losing memories of you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "And don't go forgetting about me either. You absolutely gotta remember me.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I won't forget you, Jetavie.", 3: '21'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'This time around, we snagged the key and beat that virus...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "But the world's core framework's taken a beating, falling into a logical mess like a busted dam.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "The system's pulling out all the stops, chomping away at itself to patch things up.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'But the more it does, the deeper the coding issues get.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "In the end, it's a lost cause.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Essentially, the system's dooming itself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Will this world come to an end too?', 3: '28'}
{2: 'Am I going to lose you again this time, Jetavie?', 3: '29'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "Don't sweat it, Chosen One. I can use the Access Key to open the central core.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'With advanced protocols, we can ferry our memories to the next world.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "That way, even in the next cycle, we won't lose each other.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Take out that key, Chosen One.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You hand it over to Jetavie.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Chosen One, want to know the real deal about this world?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The real deal?', 3: '36'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Well, truth is, this place is a world for ■■■■■■■■■, cooked up for some experiment about ■■■■■■.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'During the experiment, ■■■■■ got corrupted with ■■■■■■, leading to...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Yep, telling too much puts a leash on me from the core code.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'These shackles have been on me since the get-go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Me? Just think of me as a local around here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: "It's about time, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{1: '[System integrity below 30%]', 3: '75', 4: 'e60000'}
{1: '[System crash warning!]', 3: '100', 4: 'e60000'}
{1: '[183rd restoration attempt failed, shutting down]', 3: '75', 4: 'e60000'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg3901_47.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{3: "Out there, cracks like spiderwebs start creeping across the sky as the void's fingers worm their way back into this world."}
{3: "The image module's shot, colors draining away like the tide, whether it's the blue sky or the green fields..."}
{3: "Pretty soon, it's all just basic black and white, like Jetavie's twisted locks, wrapping around you in this cramped place."}
{3: 'A breeze whispers as you, a bit worse for wear, inch closer to Jetavie.'}
{3: 'She gently strokes your face as you both watch the world slowly fade away.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Chosen One, next time...'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'We gotta run faster.'}
{3: "You grab Jetavie's dainty hand, and she shoots you a relieved grin."}
{3: 'The storm tearing through the world edges closer to you at its eye, silently bearing witness to the apocalypse.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Farewell, world.'}
{2: 'Jetavie', 3: 'Farewell, Chosen One.'}
